attributes.action: help create further Anti-smoking patrol Watch’s throughout England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I organise and run an Anti-Smoking Patrol Watch in my local community along with other like-minded people. Since the introduction of the smoking ban on the 1st July 2007, we have helped bring about prosecutions for those that flout the law. We sent our local GPs, dentists and police Superintendent photographic and camcorder information of smokers wilfully breaking the law –the GPs and dentists will refuse future treatment. 

Our database of information has been passed to our police Superintendent. We also have the support, in writing of ASH, SCOTH, The British Heart Foundation, The British Cancer Society, and the BMJ. 

Remember that over 30,000 people die each year of ‘passive smoking’, (figures from ASH and Professor Robert West, an expert on tobacco addiction)
Professor West heads the Cancer Research UK health behaviour unit at University College London

If we want a healthier greener country…then please support this petition.
